mapper.insert: insert into products (p_id, p_name, p_price, p_stock, salescount, category_name, p_upload_date, p_description) values (#{p_id}, #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_stock}, #{salescount}, #{category_name}, #{p_upload_date}, #{p_description})
mapper.select: select p_id, p_name, p_price from products order by p_upload_date desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products order by salescount desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products order by salescount desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where category_name=#{category_name} order by salescount desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where category_name=#{category_name} order by p_upload_date desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where p_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%' order by p_upload_date desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where p_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%' and category_name=#{category} order by p_upload_date desc
mapper.update: update products set salescount=salescount+1, p_stock=p_stock+1 where p_id=#{p_id}
